channel.title: Desperate need for RSC, read the tutorials and am completely lost
channel.description:
I've read a variety of tutorials on how to get RSC, and I'm fairly lost on everything, I have JDK, JRE, Wamp, ant, and noobscape V3. I have no clue how to set anything up, and when I try to run the noobscape V3 .bat files I get this error:
"taskkill" is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.
Do I have to add a path to the folder where the noobscape bat files are?

item.title: Desperate need for RSC, read the tutorials and am completely lost
item.dc:creator: @waj waj
item.description:
